definitions.title: Pō‘l.
definitions.body: Impf. 3 ms. sf. [[וַתְּשׁׂקֶקֶהָ]] Ps 65:10 thou (´[[י]]:) hast visited the earth and given it abundance (Hup Che al.; > Vrss thought of [[הִשְׁקָה]] irrigate, so Bae EV).

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: pf. consec. [[וְהֵשִׁיקוּ הַיְקָבִים תִּירוֹשׁ]] Joe 2:24 the vats overflow with must, so (acc. om.) Joe 4:13.
